name: Marine South East Ltd
legal: Company limited by guarantee (not for profit)
goal:
Marine Knowledge & Innovation Cluster of over 2000 Companies in the SE of England.

Delivering Blue Growth Agenda for SMEs and liaising with other Regional Clusters across Europe.

Liaising with other Clusters on a Global Basis.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
DG Mare Blue Growth Agenda & Integrated Maritime Policy

DG Regio initiatives including Atlantic Action Plan & Channel / 2Seas / NW Europe Interreg / ESIF/FP7/Horizon2020 / Blue Careers / Defence Related Model Regions
